title: [16x][1.6.6]簡單但不失美感 Adventurer's Pack
author: nic148
txt_content:
這個材質需然是16x,但絕對不會輸给高清的材質的,材質的線條簡單優美,給人一種舒服的感覺
不過作者還沒對生物的材質作出修改,十分可惜
[attach]5705[/attach][attach]5706[/attach][attach]5707[/attach][attach]5708[/attach]
[attach]5709[/attach]

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 我就是喜歡16。 不用裝睾清補丁-w-

replies.author: Minecrafthero
replies.txt_content: 终于看见了一个16x，内牛满面啊

replies.author: howard
replies.txt_content:
